title: Decimal Degrees to Degrees, Minutes, Seconds Converter

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Degrees = integer part of decimal degrees Minutes = integer part of (decimal degrees - degrees) × 60 Seconds = (decimal degrees - degrees - minutes/60) × 3600
